glsa.title: po4a: Insecure temporary file creation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in po4a, allowing for a symlink attack.

background.p: po4a is a set of tools for helping with the translation of documentation.

description.p: The po4a development team reported a race condition in the gettextize() function when creating the file "/tmp/gettextization.failed.po".

impact.p: A local attacker could perform a symlink attack, possibly overwriting files with the permissions of the user running po4a.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All po4a users should upgrade to the latest version:
